guan-etal-2022-corpus.title: A Corpus for Understanding and Generating Moral Stories
guan-etal-2022-corpus.author:
Guan, Jian  and
Liu, Ziqi  and

guan-etal-2022-corpus.paperMotivationText: Assess the ability of machines to understand and tell moral stories and to align the stories with the moral values they carry
guan-etal-2022-corpus.paperContributionText: STORAL, a new dataset of Chinese and English human-written moral stories
guan-etal-2022-corpus.paperResultsText: Existing LMs fall short of understanding and generating moral stories
guan-etal-2022-corpus.dataDomainOtherText: fictional short stories on mixed topics
